captions.text:
Crack open a cold one with your Minecraft
Pickaxe Bottle Opener, and hide your Nintendo
Controller Wallet.
I'm Jake, and this is episode #4 of Game LÜT.

Instill fear in your enemies with this $1,000
7-foot Skyrim Dragonborn statue, and then
FUS RO Dora The Adventurer t-shirt.

If you really want to scare some people get
this Minecraft creeper hoodie from Jinx.com
which goes from cool to creepy in one zip.

But, if that isn't crazy enough for you, then
get your pound of flesh with this custom made

Psycho Bandit mask that has built-in LED's
above the eyes. Or, you can always download

and build this free Psycho Bandit papercraft
mask that was created by Gearbox employee
Jeffrey B.

If you'd rather decorate your room instead
of your face, try these wall decals from Blik

that include Mario, Mega-Man, Asteroids, and
more. All the decals are moveable so you can

make space for these amazing video game propaganda
posters by artist Aaron Wood.

If all this propaganda is effective, you'll
want to protect yourself with a stainless

steel Zelda Master Sword from thinkgeek.com
because It's Dangerous To Go Alone...Engagement
Rings.

After you've proposed get your gal something
to go with that ring like this Skyward Heart

necklace and a Game Boy dress. Heck, you deserve
something too you snazzy fella, why not some
custom painted Nike Dunks?

Then, cruise around in style with this to-scale
Halo Warthog. . The warthog is fully operational,

although not street legal, and only costs
17,500 pounds.

But what do you care? You're rolling in the
dough with these Fallout Cookies you baked

whilst wearing your Assassin's Creed Apron.
Eatzio!

Instead of being an assassin in the kitchen,
be one in AssassinCraft, a mod for Minecraft

that adds elements from the Assassin's Creed
series. It has your hidden blade, throwing
knives and you can even scale buildings.

After a long day of lighting pigs on fire,
sit back and relax on one of these awesome
video game pillows.

While you're hanging out, grab your PS3 controller
and your smartphone and then put them together

with Game Klip.
Game Klip allows you to easily, and comfortably,

use a real game controller on your Android
device. Links to compatible phones and games
are listed below.

Toss your game klip in a Koopa Shell backpack,
put on a League of Legends Teemo Helmet Hat,

and scout out these Tim Burton inspired Pokemon
prints by Vaughn Pinpin.

Turn on your Redstone Ore lamp and subscribe
to Vsauce3 for more Game LÜT.

Links to everything are in the description
below. I'm Jake and, as always, thanks for
watching.

Also, go check out the Humble THQ Bundle that
gets you Darksiders, Red Faction Armageddon,

Metro 2033, and more PC games, all for the
great price of whatever you want.

title: Buy a HALO WARTHOG!! -- Game LÜT #4
